verses.verse: Paul <S%G3972><s%> Bondman <S%G1401><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> <S%G652><s%> And Apostle <S%G1161><s%> Of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> The Faith <S%G4102><s%> Elect <S%G1588><s%> Of God's <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Knowledge <S%G1922><s%> Of The Truth <S%G225><s%> Which Is <S%G3588><s%> ' According To <S%G2596><s%> Piety; <S%G2150><s%>

' In The <S%G1909><s%> Hope <S%G1680><s%> Of Life <S%G2222><s%> Eternal, <S%G166><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Promised <S%G1861><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Who Cannot Lie <S%G893><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Before <S%G4253><s%> <S%G5550><s%> The Ages Of Time, <S%G166><s%>

<S%G5319><s%> But Manifested <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2540><s%> In Its Own Seasons <S%G2398><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3056><s%> His Word <S%G846><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Proclamation <S%G2782><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Was Entrusted With <S%G4100><s%> I 1473 P-1NS ' According To The 2596 PREP Commandment 2003 N-ASF 3588 T-GSM Of Saviour 4990 N-GSM Our 2257 P-1GP God; 2316 N-GSM

To Titus My <S%G5103><s%> True <S%G1103><s%> Child <S%G5043><s%> According To Our <S%G2596><s%> Common <S%G2839><s%> Faith : <S%G4102><s%> Grace, <S%G5485><s%>, Mercy <S%G1656><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> From <S%G575><s%> God The <S%G2316><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> And The <S%G2532><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4990><s%> Our Saviour. <S%G2257><s%>

<S%G5127><s%> For This Cause <S%G5484><s%> I Left <S%G2641><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Crete, <S%G2914><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3588><s%> The Things Lacking <S%G3007><s%> Thou Mightest Go On To Set Right, <S%G1930><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Mightest Appoint <S%G2525><s%> <S%G2596><s%> In Every City <S%G4172><s%> Elders, <S%G4245><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Thee 4671 P-2DS Ordered : 1299 V-AMI-1S

If <S%G1487><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Unimpeachable, <S%G410><s%> <S%G1520><s%> Write <S%G1135><s%> Husband, <S%G435><s%> Children <S%G5043><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> Believing, <S%G4103><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Under <S%G1722><s%> Accusation <S%G2724><s%> Of Dissoluteness <S%G810><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Insubordinate <S%G506><s%>

<S%G1163><s%> For It Behooves <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Overseer <S%G1985><s%> Unimpeachable <S%G410><s%> To Be, <S%G1511><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> God's <S%G2316><s%> Steward; <S%G3623><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Selfwilled, <S%G829><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Passionate, <S%G3711><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Given To Wine, <S%G3943><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> A Striker, <S%G4131><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Greedy Of Base Gain, <S%G146><s%>
But <S%G235><s%> Hospitable, <S%G5382><s%> A Lover Of Good, <S%G5358><s%> Discreet, <S%G4998><s%> Just, <S%G1342><s%> Holy, <S%G3741><s%> Temperate, <S%G1468><s%>

Holding To <S%G472><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Teaching <S%G1322><s%> Faithful <S%G4103><s%> Word, <S%G3056><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Able <S%G1415><s%> He May Be <S%G5600><s%> Both <S%G2532><s%> To Encourage <S%G3870><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Teaching <S%G1319><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sound, <S%G5198><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Gainsay <S%G483><s%> To Convict. <S%G1651><s%>

<S%G1526><s%> For There Are <S%G1063><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Insubordinate <S%G506><s%> Vain Talkers <S%G3151><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Mind Deceivers, <S%G5423><s%> Especially <S%G3122><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Of The <S%G1537><s%> Circumcision, <S%G4061><s%>

Whom <S%G3739><s%> It Is Necessary <S%G1163><s%> To Stop The Mouths Of, <S%G1993><s%> Who <S%G3748><s%> Whole <S%G3650><s%> Houses <S%G3624><s%> Overthrow, <S%G396><s%> Teaching <S%G1321><s%> Things Which They <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Ought Not, <S%G1163><s%> Base <S%G150><s%> Gain <S%G2771><s%> For Sake Of. <S%G5484><s%>

Said <S%G2036><s%> One <S%G5100><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Themselves <S%G846><s%> <S%G2398><s%> Of Their Own <S%G846><s%> A Prophet, <S%G4396><s%> Creationist <S%G2912><s%> Always Are <S%G104><s%> Liars, <S%G5583><s%> Evil <S%G2556><s%> Wild Beasts, <S%G2342><s%> Gluttons <S%G1064><s%> Lazy. <S%G692><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G3141><s%> This Testimony <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> True; <S%G227><s%> ' For <S%G1223><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Cause <S%G156><s%> Convict <S%G1651><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> With Severity, <S%G664><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> They May Be Sound <S%G5198><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Faith, <S%G4102><s%>

Not <S%G3361><s%> Giving Heed <S%G4337><s%> To Jewish <S%G2451><s%> Fables <S%G3454><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Commandments <S%G1785><s%> Of Men, <S%G444><s%> Turning Away From <S%G654><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Truth. <S%G225><s%>

<S%G3956><s%> All Things Are <S%G3303><s%> Pure <S%G2513><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Pure; <S%G2513><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But To Those Who <S%G1161><s%> Are Defiled <S%G3392><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Unbelieving <S%G571><s%> Nothing Is <S%G3762><s%> Pure; <S%G2513><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Are Defiled <S%G3392><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> Both <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Mind <S%G3563><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Their Conscience. <S%G4893><s%>

God <S%G2316><s%> They Profess <S%G3670><s%> To Know, <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1161><s%> But In Works <S%G2041><s%> Deny Him, <S%G720><s%> Abominable <S%G947><s%> Being <S%G5607><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Disobedient, <S%G545><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> As To <S%G4314><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Work <S%G2041><s%> Good <S%G18><s%> Found Worthless. <S%G96><s%>
